member.name: F:Platform.AppVersionHelper.Version
member.summary: Gets current version of the application. It's also shown in the web page.

member.name: P:Platform.AppVersionHelper.ReleaseDate
member.summary: Gets release (last build) date of the application. It's shown in the web page.

member.name: P:Platform.Timing.AppTimes.StartupTime
member.summary: Gets the startup time of the application.

member.name: T:Platform.Web.WebContentDirectoryFinder
member.summary: This class is used to find root path of the web project in; unit tests (to find views) and entity framework core command line commands (to find conn string).
